ARABIC: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord knows best who is misguided from His Way and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your Lord surely knows those who have strayed from his path, and knows those who are rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And your - Lord knows well who stray from His path, and also those who are rightly-guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord knows best those who have gone astray from His path and those who are rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Your Lord well knows who has strayed from His way; and He well knows the people on guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord! It is He Who knows best who strays from His way, and He knows best the rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely your Lord-- He best knows who goes astray from His way, and He best knows those who follow the right course.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thy Lord knows very well who goes astray from His path; He knows very well the right-guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord, He knoweth best who erreth from His way; and He knoweth best (who are) the rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thy Lord; He knoweth best whosoever strayeth from His path and He knoweth best the guided ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord knows best those who stray from His way; and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thy Lord knoweth best who strayeth from His way: He knoweth best who they are that receive His guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord! It is He Who knows best who strays from His Way, and He knows best the rightly guided ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your Lord knows best who stray from His Path and the guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord knows best who strays from His path, and He knows best the guided ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:117] Your Lord knows best those who stray from His way and He knows well the rightly guided, and will requite both of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord, He knoweth best who erreth from His way) from His religion and obedience; (and He knoweth best (who are) the rightly guided) to His religion, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions.
